text:
SAN FRANCISCO STATE COLLEGE
1600 Holloway Avenue
San Francisco 27, California
Television Research Project
January 22, 1957
Mr, Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
NAEB
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr, Skomia:
Since the courses involved in our project
were started just this semester, we do not have all of the
data collected, not to mention analyzed. We may have a
progress report available late next semester. The final
report will be available, and we will send you a report
late next summer.::.
Lyle Nelson sends his regards.
Sincerely yours,
Robert E. Dreher
Director, Television
Research Project
